content.text: Hi there! I'm the owner of a juicing bar and I love my job.
Hey there! I just got back from vacation, I went hiking and swimming. How was your day?
It was pretty good, I just got back from work and I'm about to relax and watch some Friends.
Friends is a great show! I love it! My parents have always been there for me and supported my dreams.
That's awesome! My parents are pretty great too. I'm single and focused on my career, but I secretly watch wrestling to take my mind off of the stress of running my business.
That's pretty cool! I enjoy John Grisham movies, but not his books. I'm an Italian American and I own 9 guitars.
That's a lot of guitars! I'm not really into music, but I do love to cook. I'm a huge fan of raw onions.
Raw onions? That's weird, but I'm sure you're good at cooking if you're a juicing bar owner. I'm more of a meat and potatoes kind of guy.
I love meat and potatoes too! I'm actually going to make some dinner right now. What are you doing tonight?
I'm not sure yet, but I'm sure I'll find something to do. I love exploring new places when I'm on vacation.
I love exploring new places too! I'm always looking for new places to go.
